page.title: 18FARMS.
page.content: WHITTONS FARM (695344) council owned farmed by father & son.Acreage 82 Crops: Wheat, barley,and peas.No live- stock. In 2nd:world war American plane crashed in a field,this was dug up in 1980 by some conservationists. {MILL FARM}(701351) council owned farm Acreage:80 Crops: Wheat, barley and potatoes. No livestock. {BOYTON HALL(706340) & PARK FARM} (716344) Family farm.Employing 6 men. Acreage:830,Crops: Wheat barley and rape.Silage for cattle feed. Livestock:Dairy Herd 250. {LOCKSMITHS FARM}(708365) family farm, l employee.Acreage:180,crops: wheat, barley,rape and hay.Livestock: 2 goats 10 sheep,2 horses,20 chickens. The farmhouse was a school during the 2nd. World War.The farm derives it's name from a locksmiths shop opposite; once known as Robin Hood End.
